alert.note: Alert for Baca (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 30 at 5:19PM MDT until July 30 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR EAST CENTRAL BACA COUNTY... At 519 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over open country south of Stonington have diminished. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen in under an hour. Flash flooding is expected to continue until the water has a chance to recede. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, rural roads, and low water crossings as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... areas just south of Stonington. This includes the following streams and drainages... North Fork Cimarron River, Sand Arroyo Creek and Dry Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
